title: Please VGU Morgana and Kayle after Nunu.
body:
Or even before Nunu if you can. Can these champions be anymore obnoxious?
Kayle is like more ADC than an ADC. She literally just stands there and idle autoattacks and hits R to keep autoattacking.
Morgana has infinite mana level 1 for some reason so she's throwing every spell at you forever and turtling the lane forever.

Both champions always when I play with them, it doesn't look like they are trying, feels like playing with a bot. I don't think this is their players; it's the total lack of skill expression, the crappy animations, and just the incredibly passive and dull playstyles they represent.

(Sorry Morgana and Kayle mains, at least you'll get better looking character models...).

replies.body: I want the kayle rework just so she feels less awkward to play and so my judgement kayle gets a massive upgrade.

Kayle Morgana rework is one of my most expected VGU, i was used to play A LOT morgana and back in season 4 Kayle too, but they have old kits, sure they are fine right now but Imo an VGU would make them gorgerous and so much fun to play, they have a lot of potential.

But lets be realistic, there are other champions that need an VGU urgently more than Kayle and Morgana. Dreams are dreams xD

His gameplay is 95% different. his gameplay is maybe the most different EVER for a vgu. Even more different than Poppy or Sion (at least they kept one skill).
Aatrox kept no skills at all. The only thing that's the same is he has a *means to revive and sustain*, however that says nothing for his gameplay, just that he has a way to obtain familiar functions.

I think Urgot changed more.
Not that this is a bad thing , tho, I love Urgots playstyle.
